definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: Business components extend the infrastructure and provide management of data in back end systems.
sentences.chinese: 業務組件擴展基礎架構並在後端系統提供數據管理。

sentences.english: The logic routes the Common Customer Data Service requests to the appropriate back-end system.
sentences.chinese: 將公共客戶數據服務請求路由到相應的後端系統。

sentences.english: In a production environment, the backend systems would then read the messages from this queue.
sentences.chinese: 在生產環境中，後端系統接着將讀取此隊列的消息。

sentences.english: Batch processing is commonly offloaded to legacy backend systems.
sentences.chinese: 批處理通常被推給舊的後端系統來承擔。

sentences.english: Each back-end system provides a service for extracting the data it owns.
sentences.chinese: 每個後端系統都提供了用於提取其所屬數據的服務。
